summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6096 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Greenwood Park Annex, being the Alley between Dibble Avenue Northwest and 8th Avenue Northwest from West 83rd Street to West 85th Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84116, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
